section.p: You can print the contents of all list windows, such as the Folder List window or the Dictionary List window on a printer of your selection.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The respective window that contains the list to be printed is active.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p: Select Print listâ€¦ from the File menu.
The Print Setup window is displayed where you can specify the printer you want and the layout of your printout.

section.title: Results
section.p: The list is printed on the printer of your choice. The printout reflects the columns and column widths of the list window that is displayed. If the list window has autotext columns, for example for long document names, the width of the printed columns is adjusted to the actual length.
